name: FACE (Foundation for Awareness Counselling and Education)

address: NEAR SANTOSH GOLD SHOP, FACE, RAJAPARA, PAKUR

briefDescription: FACE Foundation for Awareness Counseling and Education came in the existence during acute mass illiteracy deplorable condition of woman and children and poverty FACE has set about its task in the remotest corner of the state of Jharkhand India This was the beginning of the long journey of FACE the marked interventions Non formal education centre for girl children Residential education for tribal girls Capacity building in various sectors Educators Volunteers Village level youth Stake holders ICDS workers primary and upper primary Teacher Sensitization meeting in rural community Vocational training of under privileged women Zarri and Jute handicrafts Special education for drop out and never enrolled children Functional education for Adults
